name: Tales of Symphonia Chronicles
description:
Experience the complete Tales of Symphonia adventure like never before with Tales of Symphonia Chronicles.

The original Tales of Symphonia series has been remastered with enhanced visuals, additional content and a dual audio track including both English and Japanese voices and the original Japanese theme songs.

Celebrate the 10th anniversary of the sweeping epic adventure that is Tales of Symphonia.

Please note:
This item contains both full games of Tales of Symphonia™ and Tales of Symphonia™ Dawn of the New World™ game downloads. These games are available individually. Be aware that it is possible to download the games twice. There are no refunds for this item.

Tales of Symphonia™

Compatible with PlayStation®3.
4100KB minimum space required
1 - 4 Players
DUALSHOCK®3 Vibration Function
HDTV screen resolution: 720p

Tales of Symphonia™ Dawn of the New World™

Compatible with PlayStation®3.
3156KB minimum space required
1 - 4 Players
DUALSHOCK®3 Vibration Function
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
